text_block_list.name: Agnes Digital
text_block_list.text: A fangirl's gotta be ready,always. Which is why I'm currently awake and dressed at 5:00a.m.

text_block_list.name: Agnes Digital
text_block_list.text: Good morning, Trainer! I'm so... SO<n>excited for today!
choice_data_list:
You certainly sound ready, getting up so early
and all.

You certainly sound ready, getting up so early
and all.

text_block_list.name: Agnes Digital
text_block_list.text:
Of course! Anyone'd be pumped for a<n>pilgrimage to oshi
sites!

text_block_list.name: Agnes Digital
text_block_list.text:
Each Umamusume has their own life<n>story... their own
unique legend. And<n>today, we're going to follow those<n>
journeys through a series of historic<n>locations.

text_block_list.name: Agnes Digital
text_block_list.text:
Ideally, I would've wanted at least a<n>month for the tour, but
I've got my<n>own races to run, so today's gonna<n>be
jam-packed!

text_block_list.name: Agnes Digital
text_block_list.text:
So little time, so many oshis. Now,<n>let's get this show on the
road!

text_block_list.name: Agnes Digital
text_block_list.text:
Here we are! Well, almost. We're<n>here for the flower field
over there.<n>It's called the Restful Garden... by me<n>
anyways.

text_block_list.name: Agnes Digital
text_block_list.text:
It's said that the flowers here have<n>symbolic meanings,
which<n>Umamusume use to confess their<n>true, secret
feelings.

text_block_list.name: Agnes Digital
text_block_list.text:
In particular, there are several stories<n>of Umas exchanging
clovers with their<n>closest, dearest rival!

text_block_list.name: Agnes Digital
text_block_list.text:
And do you know what clovers<n>mean? "Think of me"!
"Promise"!<n>They're promising to have each other<n>in their
hearts forever and ever and<n>everrr!

text_block_list.name: Agnes Digital
text_block_list.text:
I. KNOW. RIGHT?! Their feelings run<n>deeper than the
Mariana Trench!

text_block_list.name: Agnes Digital
text_block_list.text: For our next stop—behold the Park of<n>Sisterly Races!

text_block_list.name: Agnes Digital
text_block_list.text:
Now, this story's actually about<n>Hayahide. It's said that she
used to<n>race her little sister Brian when they<n>were kids.

text_block_list.name: Agnes Digital
text_block_list.text: Imagine having your own sister asyour rival. Just think what it'd be likerunning around here together...Doesn't it inspire you to run too?!

text_block_list.name: Agnes Digital
text_block_list.text:
Do I ever! Following their footsteps<n>will bring me that much
closer to them<n>in spirit—that's the best part of being<n>a
simp! Let's goooo!

text_block_list.name: Agnes Digital
text_block_list.text: ...Mmm ahhhh!

text_block_list.name: Agnes Digital
text_block_list.text: O. M. G! This "Ramen of Champions"is everything!

text_block_list.name: Agnes Digital
text_block_list.text: It's so good! And, uh... it sure is<n>champion-sized!

text_block_list.name: Agnes Digital
text_block_list.text: N-not just anyone, could conquer...<n>this... much... uuugh...

text_block_list.name: Agnes Digital
text_block_list.text: I'm fine! Countless challengers havetaken this seat, putting their life on theline to take the champion's crown. I have to know... what they feltwhen... they...

text_block_list.name: Agnes Digital
text_block_list.text: Urp...

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
We power our way through stop after<n>stop on Digital's
simp pilgrimage<n>until...

text_block_list.name: Agnes Digital
text_block_list.text:
We did it! That honeyade stand was<n>the final stop on our
route. What a<n>day!

text_block_list.name: Agnes Digital
text_block_list.text:
No kidding! For real, thanks for<n>sticking it out for the whole
trip! o7

text_block_list.name: Agnes Digital
text_block_list.text: Oh, also... Hehe. This was a lot of fun.

text_block_list.name: Agnes Digital
text_block_list.text: I was originally planning to go by<n>myself, you know. But...

text_block_list.name: Agnes Digital
text_block_list.text:
And that's the pilgrimage, all mapped<n>out! Muhuhwa. ☆ I'm
gonna talk<n>Trainer's ear off when I get back. ♪

text_block_list.name: Classmate
text_block_list.text:
Ahaha, what do you even mean,<n>"pilgrimage"? But sounds
like you're<n>gonna have a blast!

text_block_list.name: Agnes Digital
text_block_list.text: Whoa?! D-did you uh… hear all that?<n>Sorry for being loud!

text_block_list.name: Classmate
text_block_list.text:
Aaanyways, what about your trainer,<n>though? They're not
going with you?

text_block_list.name: Agnes Digital
text_block_list.text:
Wait! I-I honestly never thought of<n>that. Me and Trainer...
simping<n>together?

text_block_list.name: Agnes Digital
text_block_list.text: Nnn?<n>NNAAASDFSKJAHLAKLLJASDLA?!!?!

text_block_list.name: Agnes Digital
text_block_list.text:
And what would you know? Going<n>out with other people is
actually really,<n>reeeeeeally—

text_block_list.name: Agnes Digital
text_block_list.text: REEEEALLY FUN!
choice_data_list: I had a great time too!
I had a great time too!

text_block_list.name: Agnes Digital
text_block_list.text:
I'm glad to hear it! I wasn't sure if<n>you'd even agree to
come, seeing as<n>it was such an early start on your day<n>
off.

text_block_list.name: Agnes Digital
text_block_list.text:
It was so worth it though! I feel like<n>I've just unlocked
some huge secret<n>life hack!

text_block_list.name: Agnes Digital
text_block_list.text:
I legit can't believe I never thought of<n>this. The two of us
can simp together<n>for double the fun!

text_block_list.name: Agnes Digital
text_block_list.text:
To be honest, I'm still really blown<n>away by the fact that
there's<n>someone on this planet who actually<n>even likes
the same stuff I do!

text_block_list.name: Agnes Digital
text_block_list.text:
No it's not! As I'm sure you've<n>noticed, I tend to go waaay
overboard<n>with this stuff.

text_block_list.name: Agnes Digital
text_block_list.text:
Barely anyone can keep up with the<n>otaku talk, let alone
join in on it! You<n>have no idea how rare a fellow Uma<n>simp
is!

text_block_list.name: Agnes Digital
text_block_list.text:
But now whenever the feels hit hard,<n>I get so excited to
share the good<n>news with you!

text_block_list.name: Agnes Digital
text_block_list.text: Huh? Y-you, you really mean it?!

text_block_list.name: Agnes Digital
text_block_list.text:
Always?! You're sure??!? You're<n>reeeally sure???!?!1?
Because<n>you're about to unleash the<n>floodgates of my
ota—

text_block_list.name: Agnes Digital
text_block_list.text: HOLD THAT THOOOUGHT!

text_block_list.name: Agnes Digital
text_block_list.text: Look. Over there. Is that...

text_block_list.name: Agnes Digital
text_block_list.text:
Vodka and Daiwa Scarlet?! See? Over<n>by the bridge? It
seems like they're<n>arguing over something.

text_block_list.name: Agnes Digital
text_block_list.text: Ah! Could this... could this be the birth<n>of a new legend?!

text_block_list.name: Agnes Digital
text_block_list.text:
C'mon, don't just stand there!<n>We've gotta hurry! Go, go,
go, GO!

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
Before I can get a word in, Digital<n>takes off to get a good
view. For lack<n>of a better plan, I chase after her for<n>one
more round of "simping."
